label: specifiedPayment
comment: An advance payment specified in this header trade settlement.
An instalment payment specified for this instalment plan.

rangeIncludes.comment: A discharge of obligations in respect of funds or securities, transferred through one of several payments, between two or more parties.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
A plan for paying a total sum of money by several payments made over a period of time.
